title: Just Installed Andriod 11 Security Update Oct 5 2020 and now my Pixel 4XL is Corrupt and wont start
content:
i installed the Andriod 11 update a couple weeks ago on my Pixel 4XL I regret that, my device has not been the same since.

What made this worse today Oct 5, 2020 there was a security update installed and now my device has the dreaded "Your device is corrupt" and won' do anything.

Any help?
Anyone else have this problem?
